ml.alternet.security.auth.hashers.impl

Interface Argon2Hasher.Argon2Bridge

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Argon2Hasher.Bridge
    Enclosing class:
    Argon2Hasher

    @LookupKey(byDefault=true,
           implClass=Argon2Hasher.Bridge.class)
public static interface Argon2Hasher.Argon2Bridge
    A bridge with any Argon2 implementation.
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Argon2Hasher.Argon2Bridge.Type 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Argon2Hasher.Argon2Bridge $
      The singleton implementation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] encrypt(byte[] passwordb, byte[] salt, int memoryCost, int timeCost, int parallelism, Argon2Hasher.Argon2Bridge.Type variant, int version, int outputLength, byte[] additional, byte[] secret)
      Computes an Argon2 hash.

    • Field Detail

      • $

        static final Argon2Hasher.Argon2Bridge $
        The singleton implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • encrypt

        byte[] encrypt(byte[] passwordb,
               byte[] salt,
               int memoryCost,
               int timeCost,
               int parallelism,
               Argon2Hasher.Argon2Bridge.Type variant,
               int version,
               int outputLength,
               byte[] additional,
               byte[] secret)
        Computes an Argon2 hash.
        Parameters:
        passwordb - the password to encrypt
        salt - the salt
        memoryCost - the memory cost, -1 for the default
        timeCost - the time cost, -1 for the default
        parallelism - the parallelism, -1 for the default
        variant - "argon2i", "argon2i", "argon2id"
        version - v=19 corresponds to 0x13, or Argon2 v1.3 ; can also be 0x10
        outputLength - -1 for the default which is 32 bytes
        additional - Maybe null
        secret - Maybe null
        Returns:
        The hash.
